original_text: And they put the ark of the Lord on the cart and the box with the golden mice and the images of their tumors.
korean_text: 여호와의 궤와 및 금 쥐와 그들의 독종의 형상을 담은 상자를 수레 위에 실으니

sentences.original_text: And they put the ark of the Lord on the cart
and the box with the golden mice
and the images of their tumors
